price: Kaži robovima Mojim da sam Ja, zaista, Onaj Koji prašta i da sam milostiv,
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
